description: This file is a Qwik component defining the main route for a recipe explorer web app. It manages state for search queries, tags, and loading state, and renders other components like SearchBar, TagChips, RecipeGrid, EmptyState, and LoadingSkeleton based on the current state.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main functional component defining the route's UI and logic.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up a side effect to initialize search query from URL parameters and updates loading state.

methods.name: toggleTag$
methods.description: Handles toggling tags in the activeTags state set.
